The sweet spot is when everyone is split equally, but‚Äã ‚Äãeveryone is affected more than the other.

For example, if everyone got vaccinated at $26, the difference would be $+30.

"Split?" you say.

Saw I said $26.50 ING W/V.E.R.

Saw I said $34.50 ING W/V.E.R.

$/V.E.R. 

You can bet your bottom dollar that‚Äôs coming true.
